name: EVN Report Publications
description: Articles and essays published in EVN Report, covering Armenian culture, society, and contemporary issues.

name: The Highlander Magazine
description: Student journalism at AUA's The Highlander, featuring creative writing, student life coverage, and personal essays including "Dark Chocolate: How I Fed Myself A Story" and more.

name: Hetq Media Factory
description: Multimedia journalism projects in Armenian, including photo stories and long-form investigative pieces exploring social issues in Armenia.

name: Coverage Magazine
description: Photographer and Reporter for Coverage Magazine. A collection of visual and written stories capturing moments and narratives.
